root.name: Rose Guns Days
root.description: OverviewRose Guns Days is the fourth visual novel series for the PC by Japanese doujin developer 07th Expansion that began releasing episodically on August 11, 2012.The fan translation team Witch Hunt has once again received permission from 07th Expansion to create an English translation patchs for Rose Guns Days episodes, similar to what the team did with the Umineko series. Witch Hunt has already created an English patch for the Rose Guns Days demo which was released day and date with the Japanese on July 6, 2012.
